title: eppOdum piriyAmal
sahitya:
eppOdum piriyAmal iruppAi ennuLLattil ceppariya sukha nAthanE


anupallavi

  tappidangaL sheidAlum daNDittuk-kaNDittu dayavAga kUDiyun mayamAga suyamAga


caraNam    nIyinri nAnillai nIrinri vaLamillai nilaminrip-payirum illai
tAyinri sUlillai sEyinrik-kulamillai taNNaruLilAdinda maNNulaga vAzhvillai
